Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Barbara Ellis
Reviews.Content: As before the tv was perfect it's perfect size and great color easy setup and fast delivery. I have bought TV's from you before and will continue

Reviews.Title: Great, but wait till the seller put it on sale
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: This is the exact same TV as the oComos($169). The HDMI and MHL ports are on the side and not the bottom

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 32" LED 720P HDTV
3 x HDMI Port, MHL Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wallmountable 200 x 200 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: Sceptre Inc. E328BV-MDC 32-Inch LED-Lit 720p 60Hz TV (Glossy Black)
